item.title: Hugo Quick Ref
item.description: Hugo Quick Reference Install Hugo install hugo via chocolate choco install hugo -confirm install Sass/SCSS version choco install hugo-extended -confirm Hugo Cmd new site hugo new site <FolderName> new post hugo new posts/hello-world.md preview site hugo server -D build site hugo Reference 如何將hugo部落格部署到github上
